name: Godwin Mordi
what_you_do: Bidemi Mark-Mordi is a Minister, Writer, Publisher, Author, Entrepreneur, Mentor and Life Coach.
who_you_serve: Bidemi Mark-Mordi is committed to helping you identify, explore, distill your potential and fulfill your purpose.
social_proof: Bidemi Mark-Mordi has published a book called 'Destiny Navigational Application' and has a podcast called 'The Nevertheless Show'.
signature_programs: Destiny Navigational Application (book), The Nevertheless Show (podcast)
business_focus: Bidemi Mark-Mordi is committed to helping people identify, explore, and fulfill their purpose.
service_provided: keynote speaking, coaching, mentorship, digital scale and velocity
